posts.post_content:
I have had an inquiry as to whether this is a trimmed card or not. I know there were some issues with later graded GAI cards. This is an earlier grade.

I am by no means an expert on trimmed cards. That being said I will offer up some photos for review. 

If there are any other "tests" that someone could recommend, I'd be happy to oblige. If anyone has feedback to add to this, I'd love to hear it.

Measurements - 1 1/2 x 2 5/8 (I started out on the 1" line so you could see the tape better):

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/IMGP0129_zps51f33aa1.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/IMGP0130_zpsf30eec84.jpg[/IMG]

Compared to some raw T206s:

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/cards/IMGP0126_zps85ed1af3.jpg[/IMG]
